title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Youre drawn along Memory Lane to remember people and things youve known and lost. You might be alternately sad and joyful or anxious and tranquil on this journey today. There is no use lamenting whats been left behind. It is natural to release or lose possessions before collecting new ones. You breathe in to breathe out, and vice versa. However, the purpose of reflecting on your past is to cultivate a better practice for thriving in the moment. As Aquarian Havelock Ellis wrote, All the art of living lies in a fine mingling of letting go and holding on. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
